content: Is GitHub acting a little strange for anyone else? I'm seeing review comments being listed as "N seconds in the future" after refreshing the page a bunch, my responses are being listed after the comments I'm responding to, because I'm responding to comments from the future.
by the way, @nagisa , I wanted to check if you'd be willing to run the compiler meetings for the next two or three weeks

I'm about to go on leave for ~2 weeks (twins are supposed to be delivered on Tuesday), and you did a great job with the other meetings you've run. So I figured it be good if I can get you onboard to run them again in the near term.
@nagisa so do you want to run the meeting this coming Thu? (else I can)
Iâ€™m fine with either of us running. I did tell @pnkfelix that Iâ€™m able to run both this and the meeting after that
(I remembered asking but not the answer)
ok, I'm happy not to run it
